name: 2BLUE
description:
Original project completion date - 2018. 

Requires flash player or a flash emulator. http://www.swffileplayer.com/ should work.

You must turn off the machine.

With no way to fight any of the bosses, you must simply survive long enough to win by default, dodging and weaving through their hailstorms of bullets with precise timing and finesse.

Be warned - this is the most difficult game I have ever released. You can warp to any boss in the game using the "warp" menu in extras.

Music by Sadwrist, 666vandal, Basilisk, and Kid Raiya. Cover art by RustyToast.
